channel.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - January 13, 2023
channel.description:
Greetings, all! [This week's Gauntlet Calendar video roundup post](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-video-roundup-january-13-2023) is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week we've got sessions of these great games:
* _Apocalypse Keys_ * _Be Seeing You_ * _Hearts of Wulin_ * _Mountain Home_ * _Once More Into the Void_ * _Red Air_ * _The Between_ * _Trail of Cthulhu_
Thanks go out to all this week's facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the [Gauntlet Calendar category](https://forums.gauntlet-rpg.com/c/gauntlet-calendar) on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the [Gauntlet Calendar](https://gauntletcalendar.com/events) to play!

item.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - January 13, 2023

item.description:
@flatvurm wrote:

Greetings, all! This week’s Gauntlet Calendar video roundup post is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week we’ve got sessions of these great games:
